title: Cool football tailgating fare for still-hot days
text:
Behind-the-Scenes October Fashion for Indulge Magazine 
For October's fashion feature, our team headed to Rebecca Low Sculptural Metal Gallery & Studio in Fort Worth. Jeremy Cannon Comments Join the Discussion 
Fort Worth Star-Telegram is pleased to provide this opportunity to share information, experiences and observations about what's in the news. Some of the comments may be reprinted elsewhere on the site or in the newspaper. We encourage lively, open debate on the issues of the day, and ask that you refrain from profanity, hate speech, personal comments and remarks that are off point. Thank you for taking the time to offer your thoughts.
